snippet.title: Taxi Life A City Driving Simulator - PC GamePlay #7
snippet.description:
❤ Subscribe to Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGu9-9FqQtXAitxkOnHzz6Q?sub_confirmation=1
   ↓ More Information & App Download ↓
➔ Download Games : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351240/Taxi_Life_A_City_Driving_Simulator/
➔ Game Developer : Simteract
➔ Manage your car and your own business, transport passengers throughout Barcelona and create your own transport empire!
All you have when you arrive in Barcelona is your car and your dream. Travel through the busy streets of the famous city, carrying passengers and offering them impeccable service. You'll have to follow traffic rules, deal with impatient tourists, cope with changeable weather and heavy traffic during rush hours, adapt your routes to avoid traffic jams and accidents, but most importantly, serve your customers in a way that will earn you the highest ratings and generous rewards. tips!

Transport passengers around Barcelona, reproduced at 1:1 scale (that's 460 km or 286 miles of roads).
Relax between trips by exploring the city, its nooks and attractions.
Earn experience points by driving, exploring the city, and interacting with customers to unlock new skills, such as the ability to travel long distances.

Pick up clients and take them to their destination.
Follow traffic rules and avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians.
Change your route depending on random events (accidents, construction work, parades, etc.).
Increase your braking distance on wet road surfaces to avoid collisions.
Keep an eye on the warning lights on your dashboard and refuel or recharge your vehicle and perform maintenance as needed.
tags: Taxi Life A City Driving Simulator
